# rules

**Instance Property**

An ordered list of rules that define the filter’s operation.

## Declaration

```swift
var rules: [NEFilterRule] { get }
```

## Discussion

After applying the [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEFilterSettings], the system compares each network flow against these rules in order, and acts on the rule of the first [doc://com.apple.networkextension/documentation/NetworkExtension/NEFilterAction] that matches.

## Inspecting Filter Settings

- **defaultAction**: The default action to take for flows of network data that don’t match any of the specified rules.
